name: Polyglot Language Learning Quiz
description:
A quiz that helps you review words like a proper polyglot. Over 10,000 words spread across 10 languages for all your learning efforts.

Features

  • All questions have a timer set between 2 and 20 seconds.
  • Choose how many questions per quiz. From 3 to 30.
  • Check the number of languages in the list below
  • You can review any language vocabulary.
  • The questions can be either in English or in the target language

Build vocabulary in the following languages:
  • French
  • German
  • Italian
  • Lithuanian
  • Polish
  • Portuguese
  • Spanish
  • Japanese
  • Chinese
  • Korean
